sentences.sContent: If you're in a hurry, you might nod curtly and be on your way; but you could decide to take your time, smile back and repeat the message before you go.
sentences.sContent_eng: If you're in a hurry, you might nod curtly and be on your way; but you could decide to take your time, smile back and repeat the message before you go.
sentences.sCn: 如果你在匆忙赶路，可能只是简单地点头，然后继续赶路；但是你也可能决定花点时间，在走之前回她一个微笑，重复这个祝福。

sentences.sContent: On the back—in pencil, for some reason; he must have been in a hurry—he wrote, “Sweetheart!
sentences.sContent_eng: On the back—in pencil, for some reason; he must have been in a hurry—he wrote, “Sweetheart!
sentences.sCn: 在明信片的背面——不知怎么的，他一定是很匆忙，用铅笔——他写道，“宝贝！
